pageContext.claim: “So I was down in all nine places that I had to win. That wasn't a good feeling and I wake up, how are we doing? Well, you're down in all nine places. By the end of the evening, I won all nine places, right, right? Think of that.”
pageContext.analysis: Polls had Trump trailing in six key states that he later won in 2016. Moreover, the seasoned pollsters at FiveThirtyEight warned that Trump was only a “normal-sized polling error away from beating Hillary Clinton,” which was basically what happened.
